CustomField.description: Indicates how this allowance pay code will be reported during STP. Where the allowance should be added to the gross pay and not reported separately please select 'Gross'.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates how this allowance pay code will be reported during STP. Where the allowance should be added to the gross pay and not reported separately please select 'Gross'.
CustomField.label: ATO Allowance Type
